mmu.ac.uk.hackathon

Class Station

  • java.lang.Object
    • mmu.ac.uk.hackathon.Station

  • public class Station
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Station(java.lang.String stationName, double latitude, double longitude, double distance)
      Constructs a station with the name latitude and longitude and sets distance in km from users current location.
